name: Apple Pop Smoothie
description: A refreshing smoothie made with apples and soda for a fizzy twist.
steps: Chop the apple into small pieces.
In a blender, combine the chopped apple and pop.
Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Apple Soda Salad
description: A unique salad that combines the sweetness of apples with the fizz of soda.
steps: Dice the apple into small cubes.
In a bowl, toss the diced apple with the pop.
If desired, add chopped nuts for extra crunch.
